WorkItem.Description:
Opening a graphml file that uses a repfic to identify the graphml namesapce will fail parsing with "Cannot find graphml node.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<dml:graphml xmlns:dml="http://graphml.graphdrawing.org/xmlns">
  <dml:graph id="G" edgedefault="directed" parse.nodes="8" parse.edges="7" parse.order="nodesfirst" parse.nodeids="free" parse.edgeids="free" Title="1711091512">
    <dml:node id="EPBEMIST" />
    <dml:node id="HQTYMP27XP" />
    <dml:node id="REIFBXP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-02T11:52:11-2011-03-03T07:50:15" source="EPBEMIST" target="EPBEMIST" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T07:50:15-2011-03-03T07:51:45" source="EPBEMIST" target="EPBEMIST" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T07:51:45-2011-03-03T11:28:01" source="EPBEMIST" target="HQTYMP27XP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T11:28:01-2011-03-03T11:28:42" source="HQTYMP27XP" target="HQTYMP27XP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T11:28:42-2011-03-03T16:04:03" source="HQTYMP27XP" target="REIFBXP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T16:04:03-2011-03-03T16:07:40" source="REIFBXP" target="REIFBXP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T16:07:40-2011-03-03T16:07:45" source="REIFBXP" target="HQTYMP27XP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T16:07:45-2011-03-03T16:07:46" source="HQTYMP27XP" target="HQTYMP27XP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T16:07:46-2011-03-03T16:08:04" source="HQTYMP27XP" target="REIFBXP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T16:08:04-2011-03-03T16:08:05" source="REIFBXP" target="REIFBXP" />
    <dml:edge id="2011-03-03T16:08:05-2011-03-03T16:08:06" source="REIFBXP" target="REIFBXP" />
  </dml:graph>
</dml:graphml>

Making http://graphml.graphdrawing.org/xmlns the default namesapce and removing the dml prefix allows parsing.
WorkItem.Summary: Opening dml file fails if graphml is not defualt namespace in Xml
